JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description     Industry knowledge    P&C insurance Industry experience   Knowledge of either Personal, Commercial, Specialty lines (Must - at least one of them)   INS21, INS22 and INS23 or equivalent insurance certification (Nice to Have)      Technical skills    Hands on experience in Application Development using .NET (C#), ASP.NET, SQL Server programming, XML, XSLT (Must)   Object Oriented Programming, SOAP (Must)   Customer interfacing experience and customer presentations (Nice to Have)   SOA, Design patterns (Nice to Have)   SSIS(Nice to Have), SSRS (Nice to Have)   Biztalk, ESB, Security (https, Authentication and Authorization), Angular JS (for Skins), SSRS Reporting (Nice to Have)     Communication skills    Good communication skills (written and verbal) (Must)     Other insurance P&C packaged software experience   Duck Creek skills (Nice to Have)    Experience as Field Engineer in Duck Creek - Policy / Billing / Claims   Experience/knowledge of integration, skins   Experience in Manuscripts, Extract Mapper     IT experience    Experience / knowledge of P&C Insurance software applications   Experience / knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle (Must)   Knowledge of database - SQL Server (Must)   Experience and understanding of XML, XSLT (Must)   Experience with Integration and BI Tools (Nice to Have)
